name: Project report
query:
SELECT
    p.project_name AS "Project Name",
    p.start_date AS "Start Date",
    p.end_date AS "End Date",
    COUNT(t.task) AS "Total Tasks",
    SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Completed Tasks",
    SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 'To Do' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "To Do Tasks",
    SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 'In Progress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "In Progress Tasks"
FROM
    `tabProject-wf` p
    LEFT JOIN `tabtask list` t ON t.parent = p.name
GROUP BY
    p.project_name, p.start_date, p.end_date
ORDER BY
    p.project_name;
